title: Bradley Cooper carries his daughter Lea in New York City
text:
Irina Shayk and Bradley Cooper have been amicably co-parenting their daughter Lea De Seine Shayk Cooper, two, ever since their split in June.

And The Hangover star proved he was quite the doting dad on Monday morning when he was spotted carrying and hugging his daughter in New York City.

The 44-year-old dressed casually for the errands run and appeared to have just stepped out of the shower with wet hair.

Daddy-daughter date: Bradley Cooper proved he was very much a doting dad on Monday when he was spotted out and about New York City carrying and hugging his daughter, Lea De Seine Shayk Cooper

Bradley dressed in a light grey colored sweater top and tan chino trousers.

The Alias actor walked around with a lanyard over his neck and at one point paid much attention to his phone.

Lea was dressed to match her dad in a grey top and trousers with red sneakers.

Casual: Bradley dressed in a light grey colored sweater top and tan chino trousers

Parents: Irina Shayk and Cooper have been amicably co-parenting their daughter, two, ever since their split over the summer

Bradley and supermodel Irina Shayk called it quits back in June after four years together.

A source close to the couple told People: 'Bradley was emotionally absent during the long time filming A Star Is Born. They tried to save the relationship but it had changed.'

There were rumors at the time that he and co-star Lady Gaga had a romance blossoming in real life, following their intimate performance of Grammy and Oscar winning song, Shallow, at the Academy Awards.

Happier times: Bradley and Irina put up a strong front together during awards season earlier in the year

Rumors resurfaced once again in recent times when Life & Style reported that the singer thought Bradley was 'the one.'

'There’s no doubt about it — Lady Gaga fell head over heels for Bradley during filming and promotion of A Star Is Born,' they said.

'She’s telling her friends he broke her heart. Gaga feels like Bradley led her on because he was giving off all the signs that they’d become an item once he was single.'
description: Bradley Cooper proved he was very much a doting dad on Monday when he was spotted out and about New York City carrying and hugging his daughter, Lea De Seine Shayk Cooper, two.
